kpi.name: M1006C250

kpi_info.title: RADIO BEARER CONFIGURED FOR HS-FACH UL
kpi_info.use: "The number of successful radio bearer setups and reconfigurations to use HS-FACH uplink (HS-RACH). UPDATED: When the RNC receives positive RRC protocol acknowledgement from the UE after configuring it to use HS-FACH uplink and HS-FACH uplink was not in use before that.The counter is updated also in HS-FACH (only DL) to HS-RACH (also UL) reconfiguration."

kpi.kpi_alias: RADIO BEARER CONFIGURED FOR HS-FACH UL
